title: F/S/T Bender No Trees Piedmont Factory 42
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: F/S/T Bender No Trees Piedmont Factory 42
posts.post_content:
Hello I have this very nice Bender No Trees Piedmont Factory 42 in a PSA 4 .  I am looking to trade it for another rare or semi rare back PSA HOF or sale it for 1,200.00 paypal f/f. I am interested in cards with backs other than Piedmont and Sweet Caporal . Below are some of the cards I would be interested in trading for in a PSA 4 or above .  I want the value to be equal or will except cash or pay depending on the card I am trading for or I can sell it and find these on my own. I am including a better image of the card than I did last week. Thanks for looking and let me know what you have!
Brown Portrait
Brown Cubs Shirt
Clarke Portrait
Jennings Portrait
Joss Portrait
Mathewson Portrait/ and White Cap
Marquard Portrait
McGraw Portrait No Cap
Speaker
Waddell Portrait
Young Bare Hand

Thanks for looking and let me know what you have
bump for price drop or potential trades
